pullRequest.title: Refactor DCLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DCLStatement
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ref #7170.
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Refactor DCLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DCLStatement

commit.message: Refactor some MySQL DCLStatement & SQLServer DCLStatement
Refactor DCLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DCLStatement

nodes.bodyText: I suppose other database SQL  Statements except for MySQL are not wanted here. See the name of this class.
